author: ate
msg: JS2-973: Running Jetspeed 2.2 on Websphere 6.1 / Oracle10
- providing a workaround for the IBM JDK5 "bug" which causes "java.lang.TypeNotPresentException: Type javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement not present"
error to be thrown when processing PortletEvents using jaxb.
The only solution I could find was moving the jaxb-api jar up into the shared classloader.
For a WAR based installation on Websphere, this should be done manually as we cannot or won't "standardize" on moving such jars by default to the shared classloader.
However, for an EAR installation, the shared classloader is more properly "contained", and I have adjusted our enterprise ear builds to do this automatically now.
